content.text:
# 1971 United Kingdom census

| region_type =
| logo =
}}
The United Kingdom Census 1971 was a census of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland carried out on 25 April 1971. The census will be released in 2071.
According to the preliminary general results of the census, the population of the United Kingdom on 25 April 1971 was as follows:
{| class="wikitable"
|+ Results
|-
! Territory !! Total Population !! Male !! Female
|-
|  England || 45,879,670 || 22,299,460 || 23,580,210
|-
|  Scotland || 5,228,963 || 2,514,622 || 2,714,341
|-
|  Wales || 2,724,275 || 1,324,205 || 1,400,070
|-
|  Northern Ireland || 1,536,065 || 754,676 || 781,389
|-
|   Channel Islands || 125,240 || 60,805 || 64,435
|-
|  Isle of Man || 49,743 || 23,007 || 26,736
|-
|  United Kingdom (total) || 55,573,956 || 27,006,775 || 28,567,181
|}
See also
*Census in the United Kingdom
*List of United Kingdom censuses
